body.p:
Greenville Ky
Mch Feby 9 1864 --
Gov Bramlette
I have been asked to sign a petition for release of Stephen Duvall, now confined in penetentiary, for murder of a free negro.

Duvall is represented as being in very bad health. I did not know the facts attending his case, & therefore did not sign the petition, I promised to write a letter, asking that you would enquire into his case, & give due
consideration to the facts, presented by his neighbors & friends. This promise, I have fulfilled --
